description: Test agent's ability to build a simple shelter structure
goal: Build a simple 5x5 shelter with walls and a roof using the provided materials
starting_prompt: You have been given building materials to construct a simple shelter. Build a 5x5 structure with walls made of oak planks and a roof. The shelter should have at least one door for entry. Place torches inside for lighting. This is a construction task, so plan your build carefully before starting.
